longBusinessSummary: Ratnaveer Precision Engineering Limited engages in the manufacture, export, and supply of stainless-steel products in India and internationally. It produces finished sheets, washers, solar roofing hooks, and pipes and tubes. The company's products are used in various industries, including automotive, solar power, wind energy, power plants, oil and gas, and pharmaceuticals. The company was formerly known as Ratnaveer Metals Limited and changed its name to Ratnaveer Precision Engineering Limited in November 2022. Ratnaveer Precision Engineering Limited was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Vadodara, India.
